EmailTemplate.name: TS-2016-08-28-VMworld 2016.EMAIL-VMworld Post Promo
EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance To Win Tickets To AWS re:Invent!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for Visiting Turbonomic at VMworld AWS re:Invent Log In to Win One more hand. One more roll. One more spin. Vegas is engineered to keep you wanting more, which is why we'll be back November 28 - December 2 for AWS re:Invent <[[https://reinvent.awsevents.com]]>. But we love our community, so we're bringing one lucky member with us.
Don't miss your chance to win a pass to AWS re:Invent, valued at $1,599 USD, simply by Registering <[[http://signup.greencirclecommunity.com/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vmworld-2016&utm_content=09122016]]> (New Members) or Logging-In (Existing Members) to The Green Circle Community, and 'liking' this post <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/thread/3121]]> before September 21, 2016.
We will randomly select one group member from among those likes.
On to Vegas. Turbonomic
500 Boylston St, 8th Floor
Boston, MA
02116
